zh.title: 伊朗人质危机爆发，美国大使馆被占领
哥伦比亚号航天飞机STS-51-A成功发射
玛丽·罗宾逊当选爱尔兰首位女总统
拉宾遇刺，中东和平进程受挫
美国总统大选陷入争议，佛州选票成焦点
奥巴马当选美国首位非洲裔总统
上海世博会闭幕，创多项纪录
联合国气候变化巴黎大会召开

en.title: Iran hostage crisis began after US embassy seizure
Montreal Protocol signed to protect ozone layer
Lynx browser, one of the earliest web browsers, released.
Yitzhak Rabin assassinated, derailing peace process.
"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" film released.
Barack Obama elected as the first African American US President.
One Laptop per Child XO-3 tablet unveiled.
Michael Bublé releases his ninth studio album, "Nobody but Me".
Paris Agreement on climate change enters into force.
US formally withdraws from the Paris Agreement.
